thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Tech, financials lead Wall Street higher at the open

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Tech, financials lead Wall Street higher at the open
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Wall Street’s main indexes opened higher on Monday, led by technology and financial stocks, as they attempt to bounce back from their worst week in two years.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 215.99 points, or 0.89 percent, to 24,406.89. The S&P 500 gained 22.68 points, or 0.87 percent, to 2,642.23. The Nasdaq Composite added 62.39 points, or 0.91 percent, to 6,936.88. (Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru; Editing by Savio D‘Souza)
